abstract: A preliminary proxy filing for SAP‘s $5.7 billion acquisition of Business Objects, a French software firm, reveals that two other bidders had stepped forward.
lead_paragraph: A preliminary proxy filing for SAP‘s $5.7 billion acquisition of Business Objects, a French software firm, reveals that two other bidders had stepped forward.

headline.main: Oracle, I.B.M. Said to Have Bid for Business Objects

abstract: Oracle withdrew a $6.7 billion bid for the business software maker BEA Systems on Sunday, setting the stage for a proxy battle between the activist investor Carl Icahn and the BEA board.
lead_paragraph: Oracle withdrew a $6.7 billion bid for the business software maker BEA Systems on Sunday, setting the stage for a proxy battle between the activist investor Carl Icahn and the BEA board.
